title: Desserts
creator_contributor_role: KQED-TV (Television station : San Francisco, Calif.), production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cookery
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cake
description: Episode of Series "Cooking at the Academy". Expand your culinary repertoire with three stunning desserts. The lesson begins with the basics of poaching pears to create "Mendocino Poached Pears with Almond-Pear Sauce", next make a classic short dough and pastry cream base and top it with sliced fruit for a "Fresh Fruit Tart", while "Chocolate Mocha Inside-Out Cake" is a lesson in layering and cutting with the finesse of a master confectioner.
related_objects: Series; S01150; Cooking at the Academy; Active; 1991
